description: Because rain doesn't stop at your shoulders when you're hiking, climbing, or cycling, bring the Men's Full Zip PreCip® Eco Pants in Long Length on your next outdoor adventure. The waterproof/breathable PFC-free DWR Marmot NanoPro™ recycled nylon ripstop fabric will keep you dry. Full-length side zippers and an elastic waist make it easy to put these lightweight rain pants on and take them off without removing your shoes. Stash small items in the zippered side and back pockets.
name: Marmot PreCip Eco Full Zip Pants, Reg - Mens
